name: The Aquarium of Luck
description:
In The Aquarium of Luck, it's all
about decorating your fish tank and
making your fish happy! Your fish may
get hungry, fall ill, the water in the
tank may become dirty or a new baby
fish may need extra vitamins, so it's
your job to ensure the tank is clean
and that the fish are well and happy.
When youâ€™re not busy managing your
aquarium, you can play a match-3
game to earn money. Use the money
to buy food, fish or decorations for
your fish tank.
